summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3643 , for the improvement of Othello Street, from 44th Avenue South to 46th Avenue South, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44976 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
